name: Chest Buddys
description:
Chest Buddys it´s a Rogue-like game about a mage with the special power of Converting a normal Chest into his Ally.

Explore a dungeon and kill Monsters with the help of your Chests in random rooms.

Use your magic to defend yourself of monsters and to wake up a tired Chest.

Controls:

WASD: Movement

Left Click: Shoot magic

E: Interaction with objects or talk

F12: Screenshot
